summary: IT’S TIME TO ROLL!!  Hey everyone!! \QWQ/ I finally got these charms finished in time for AX, but for those of you who won’t be...
caption:
IT’S TIME TO ROLL!! 

Hey everyone!! \QWQ/ I finally got these charms finished in time for AX, but for those of you who won’t be able to go there and pick them up or want to secure them, I’ll be hosting a preorder on my storenvy!! 

https://etherelle.storenvy.com/

Thank you all so much for all the support, it’s been so nice reliving the love for D&D with all the critters!! \TTUTT/

summary: every week i start watching the new critical role episode and watch the intro  and like a fool i think “hey, let’s watch the...
body:
every week i start watching the new critical role episode and watch the intro 

and like a fool i think “hey, let’s watch the intro, i really enjoy watching the cool characters go!”

and without fail i feel the stab of Yasha’s sword in my heart when it turns into Molly’s coat on the stick

reblog.comment:

critical role (w/ taz + d&d) blog

vm campaign episodes - 117/115

m9 campaign episodes - 34/68

have a question/comment about critical role, this blog, or me? don't be shy, send me an ask!

main is @protectoroffaeries

icon credit: @swiftbell

icon description: fanart of scanlan from my critical role firefly au. he is a pale gnome with brown hair. he is posing like a model, with one hand behind his head and the other at his waist. his vest is rich purple with gold accents. he is wearing shear purple gloves and golden bicep jewelry. his makeup is purple-tinted. the background is pink. end id.

header credit (technically): @shadedforests

header description: a screenshot of an instagram message, a white bubble with black text, that reads, "Fuck you vax you made me chuckle". end id.

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

summary: One of the beds in Jester and Beau’s room: *creaks rhythmically* Nott, throwing open the door: I knew it! I knew you two were...
body:
One of the beds in Jester and Beau’s room: *creaks rhythmically*

Nott, throwing open the door: I knew it! I knew you two were fucking!

Jester, painting the entire floor: Don’t move!!!!! You’ll ruin it!!

Beau, doing push-ups on the bed: Nott if this is payback for something I did-

blog.name: artemis-pendragon
blog.title: Follow the Light Unflinchingly
blog.description: I'm Devyn, but I also go by Artemis. She/Her. 21. Not Straight™. In love with Critical Role, everything by JRR Tolkien, The X-Files, Marvel, Merlin, Star Trek, and Hawaii Five-0. Multifandom Mess. I write fanfiction on AO3 as ConsultingFangirl/DestinyWolfe.

tags: how do y'all come up with the cutest prompts
summary: Little Moments in Time: A Critical Role Collection - ArtemisPendragon (DestinyWolfe) - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of...
title: Little Moments in Time: A Critical Role Collection - ArtemisPendragon (DestinyWolfe) - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Summary: A collection of short fics based on Tumblr prompts. Each chapter will be a stand-alone one-shot. I’ll update the tags as I add new chapters.

Aaaannnd I finished Prompt/Chapter #3! The prompt was “Caleb insisting Molly room with him when Molly comes back” which was submitted by an anon. Such a fuckin cute prompt, and I loved writing it! 

(If you want a short Beauyasha, Fjorester, or Widomauk fic, submit a prompt and I’ll write a fic! I’m going into finals week now, so it might take me a while to get it done, but I’ll do my best! <3)

reblog.comment:
